      • checkIfSlidesAreAlreadySavedOnThisDate

        public static boolean checkIfSlidesAreAlreadySavedOnThisDate(java.lang.String date)
        Check if slides are already saved on this date to warn users who select a date with datepicker. The warning appears before the save or open button is clicked.
